The email references saved documents in a subpoena returns folder.

keyFacts: The document is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York dated July 12, 2019, containing financial notes on individuals related to the Epstein case.
It references an individual (DB00001) with an estimated annual income of $10 million and a net worth exceeding $500 million, whose accountant is Harry Beller of HBRK Associates.
It details multiple payments from DB00001 to another individual (DB000117) totaling $373,625 across four transactions in 2015 and 2018.
The email indicates these notes were part of a review of documents saved in a 'subpoena returns folder,' suggesting they were obtained via legal process.
The use of placeholder identifiers (DB00001, DB000117) suggests these are likely code names or redacted references to individuals under investigation.
